casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Montrez Benjamin WILLIAMS 233PA12-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 12, 2019 Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina Kathryn L. VandenBerg, Assistant Appellant Defender, for Williams, Montrez Benjamin R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 12th of August 2019 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 12th of August 2019."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 3rd day of September 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
